entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Cowansville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:52 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow early this morning. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
